quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Shari Lewis and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, travoltas. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Childrens entertainer Shari Lewis received how many Emmy Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 12

questions.question: Childrens entertainer Shari Lewis was born Sonia Hurwitz in the Bronx, New York in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1933

questions.question: Childrens entertainer Shari Lewis died on 2 August 1998 in which city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Los Angeles

questions.question: John Travolta received his first Academy Award nomination for his role in this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saturday Night Fever

questions.question: This award, established in honor of Shari Lewis, is given as a tribute to an individual, company, or organization that represents excellence in childrens programming in electronic media.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Lamb Chop Award

questions.question: Which actress co-starred with Lindsay Wagner in the TV movies Bionic Ever After and Nurses On The Line: The Crash of Flight 7?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Farrah Forke

questions.question: Which statement about Shari Lewis  father, Abe Hurwitz is true?

options.text: He was in the music business as a private music teacher.
He was a Professor of Mathematics.
He was a New York City music teacher.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was a Professor of Mathematics.

questions.question: What is the occupation of John Travoltas character in the 1983 movie Two of a Kind?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Inventor

questions.question: Which of these was not a character on a show, hosted by Shari Lewis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Socko

questions.question: Which statement about Sharis mother, Ann Ritz Hurwitz is true?

options.text: She did not work but devoted herself completely to bringing up her children.
She was a teacher of special education classes in New York.
She was the supervisor of music education for the New York public schools.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was the supervisor of music education for the New York public schools.

questions.question: In what movie did John Travolta portray Steven Kings popular character Billy Nolan?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carrie

questions.question: In the movie Callie  Son, actress Lindsay Wagner starred together with which movie star?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michelle Pfeiffer

questions.question: Actress Lindsay Wagner has co-authored a vegetarian cookbook.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: How was Shari Lewis discovered for show business?

options.text: She was discovered by Steve Allen at a tryout for his show in 1954.
She was discovered at an open audition for The Howdy Doody Club in 1955.
She was discovered by Bob Keeshan at a tryout for his show Captain Kangaroo in 1956.
She was discovered on the Arthur Godfrey Talent Scouts show in 1952.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was discovered on the Arthur Godfrey Talent Scouts show in 1952.

questions.question: Which statement best describes Shari Lewis work as children’s entertainer?

options.text: She wrote 60 books for children (and parents), recorded over 20 albums for children and adults and won a Peabody Award.
Her beloved show Lamb Chops Playhouse won her a Peabody Award and an Emmy.
She wrote 20 childrens books, recorded 15 albums for children and won three Peabody Awards.
She participated in several TV shows for children but never had a special one of her own.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She wrote 60 books for children (and parents), recorded over 20 albums for children and adults and won a Peabody Award.

questions.question: A grandmother is watching her grandchild playing on the beach when a huge wave comes and takes him out to sea. She pleads, please God, save my only grandson.
